Just finished the game and I have to say, wished this game came out sooner for other consoles!

Very good game considering it was ported from the DS.  Pretty good graphics, good game play, great story, lots of fun.
8.5/10!

Loved the ending and the intro to "Lost in Nightmare" DLC part.

Thanks for the upload!

P.S.  Now I believe "Lost into Nightmare" DLC will surely be released for PC.  Hopefully..
